text: anyone know why my  HS chrome extension is completely borked? Tried removing and reintalling

<@U7ADCU3BM> awesomely put together a fix, it will roll out soon.

The bug itself seems to be caused by a rendering bug on Google’s end. if you inspect the popup you’ll see there’s a width set on the body element. Toggling the style off then back on again causes it to display properly.
I sent it to Google for review already, should be approved within a week + time to roll out to ppl

That was a very fast review by Google!
I got the update `v1.5.6` on two different profiles too :blush:

THANK YOU! although it was a good laugh when i was doing a screenshare with a client yesterday and using the cachebuster and he was like “what are you doing?????” I’M SO HubSpot THAT I KNOW WHERE THE CACHEBUST BUTTON IS WHEN IT’S ONLY A TINY SLIVER, DUDE.
that gave me some Super Cred.

feel like there’s a meme in there.

“I’m so HubSpot… I built a CRM system that our customer’s customer uses to manage their business using CMS Hub Memberships”
